Question: Beijing Kitten&Puppy Technology Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Beijing Kitten&Puppy Technology Co., Ltd.

Product: Puppyoo T22 Pro Rinse

- Features a replaceable dual-battery design with two 8*3200mAh polymer lithium-ion batteries for extended battery life
- Offers 30 minutes of operation in max mode and up to 130 minutes in eco mode
- Equipped with Puppyoo M70 high-speed digital 3D motor, providing an impressive suction power of 770W
- Puppyoo T12 series also showcased, known for robust suction power, full-scenario cleaning capabilities, and customer-favored models such as T12 Pure and T12 Plus Rinse
- T12 Pure with 170AW suction power, magnetic dust bin design, and intelligent self-adjusting system
- T12 Plus Rinse with 185AW suction power, simultaneous mopping and vacuuming, digital display screen, intelligent dust sensing system, and 6-stage filtration design
- Rich product line including sweeping robots, mite removers, and horizontal vacuum cleaners showcased at CES 2023
Summary_cn:
北京猫狗科技有限公司。

产品: Puppyoo T22 Pro Rinse

- 具有可更换的双电池设计，配备两个8*3200mAh聚合物锂离子电池，可延长电池寿命
- 最大模式操作时间为30分钟，节能模式下可达到130分钟
- 配备Puppyoo M70高速数字3D电机，提供强大的770W吸力
- Puppyoo T12系列也在展示中，以强大的吸力，全场景清洁功能以及深受客户喜爱的T12 Pure和T12 Plus Rinse等型号而闻名
- T12 Pure具有170AW吸力，磁性储尘盒设计以及智能自适应系统
- T12 Plus Rinse具有185AW吸力，同时拖地和吸尘，数字显示屏，智能灰尘感知系统以及6级过滤设计
- 在CES 2023上展示了丰富的产品线，包括扫地机器人，除螨仪以及地平式吸尘器。
